messages.subject: Visiting Cornwall (NY, that is)
messages.msgSnippet: ... Dear Shyrley, If you d like to put up a tent by us, please come on! The name of our town might make you feel at home (we live in the village of
messages.messageBody:
> Eyup, I'm from Cornwall but the kids were born and grew up Malvern,
> Worcestershire.
> ee by gum :-)

Dear Shyrley,

If you'd like to put up a tent by us, please come on! The name of our town
might make you feel at home (we live in the village of Cornwall-on-Hudson,
hard by Cornwall, NY, which is, in turn about an hour north of NYC by train
on the west bank of the Hudson). However having visited down in the "real"
Cornwall, I figure the similarity ends there... :^) Nonetheless, you and
yours would be right welcome. The house where we are is small, but the
outside part is pretty huge! And after you visit here, you can sidle on
across to Connecticut, where they've got another Cornwall, and from there on
up to Ontario, where there's yet another :^)

Peace,
Wynn

P.S. This invite goes for any of you guys tenting around the country, Brits
or not :^)
